constraints.description: Employers must arrange preventive occupational health care at their own expense
Occupational health care must be provided to all employees regardless of contract type
Employers must make written agreement with service provider
Employers must keep agreement and workplace survey available for employees
Health examinations are mandatory when assigning work
Health examinations are mandatory if work poses particular health risks
Employees may not refuse mandatory health examinations without justified grounds
Employers must notify occupational health care of sick leave within 30 days
KELA reimbursement only available if activities follow good occupational health care practices
